title: How to add my original music to TikTok's songs library - Quora

response.answer_text: You have 2 options: Release your music officially and have it distributed to TikTok.Upload videos with your music on them and after posting the first video, change the name of the sound to whatever you want [you can only do it once].[bonus] PROMOTE YOURSELF!I am providing you with a mixtape including the best deep house & dance music songs so you can get an idea of what’s trending as of right now:  Hope it helps!
